channel.title: I need help fixing all of these t2 errors, and getplayer size missmatch!
channel.description: Hi, the client I am using is Richscape's client, and after using it for along time I noticed that it was badly known for it's t2 errors and getplayer size missmatch errors. Well I have tried fixing these errors but I can't seem to get rid of them. It happens really bad in player vs player combat. How could I resolve these errors? - Thank You, Bmxscape[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2009, 06:03:36 pm[/size][hr]I have tried replacing player update methods and some class 30 classes with some other clients but that did nothing does this have to do with serverside also?

item.title: I need help fixing all of these t2 errors, and getplayer size missmatch!
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.description:
@bmxscape wrote:

Hi, the client I am using is Richscape’s client, and after using it for along time I noticed that it was badly known for it’s t2 errors and getplayer size missmatch errors. Well I have tried fixing these errors but I can’t seem to get rid of them. It happens really bad in player vs player combat. How could I resolve these errors?

  • Thank You, Bmxscape[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 08, 2009, 06:03:36 pm[/size][hr]I have tried replacing player update methods and some class 30 classes with some other clients but that did nothing does this have to do with serverside also?

Read full topic
